mapper.sql: id, specification, manufactor, pm10, pm25, noise, wind_speed, tsp, temperature_max, temperature_min, humidity_max, humidity_min, comments, org_id, is_del, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user, wind_force, atmospheric, call_times

${alias}.id AS ${alias}_id, ${alias}.specification AS ${alias}_specification, ${alias}.manufactor AS ${alias}_manufactor, ${alias}.pm10 AS ${alias}_pm10, ${alias}.pm25 AS ${alias}_pm25, ${alias}.noise AS ${alias}_noise, ${alias}.wind_speed AS ${alias}_wind_speed, ${alias}.tsp AS ${alias}_tsp, ${alias}.temperature_max AS ${alias}_temperature_max, ${alias}.temperature_min AS ${alias}_temperature_min, ${alias}.humidity_max AS ${alias}_humidity_max, ${alias}.humidity_min AS ${alias}_humidity_min, ${alias}.comments AS ${alias}_comments, ${alias}.org_id AS ${alias}_org_id, ${alias}.is_del AS ${alias}_is_del, ${alias}.create_time AS ${alias}_create_time, ${alias}.create_user AS ${alias}_create_user, ${alias}.modify_time AS ${alias}_modify_time, ${alias}.modify_user AS ${alias}_modify_user, ${alias}.wind_force AS ${alias}_wind_force, ${alias}.atmospheric AS ${alias}_atmospheric, ${alias}.call_times AS ${alias}_call_times,
mapper.select:
SELECT
from t_project_target_set_environment a
${ew.sqlSegment}
order by a.id desc
